sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Director: Charles R. Rondeau
Starring: Ed Nelson, Jean Allison, Byron Foulger, and Edgar Buchanan
üçïNewly Restored HD Printüçï
In this macabre tale, an old hermit sells his soul to the devil to win over the woman of his dreams. Now that's true love.

TRIVIA:  The Devil's Partner  ‚Äúintroduces‚Äù Ed Nelson, but this is far from his first role. He paid his dues on the Drive-In circuit under the tutelage of Roger Corman. Beginning with "Swamp Women," Ed worked on 15 movies for the maverick filmmaker including "A Bucket of Blood," "Teenage Cave Man,‚Äù "Cry Baby Killer,‚Äù and "Attack of the Crab Monsters" where he played the crab.üçï
